definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to remove perils and solve disputes (idiom); to reconcile differences

sentences.english: Rule of law and autonomy are different authoritative power of dispute solution.
sentences.chinese: 法治和自治是解纷方式的不同权威力量。

sentences.english: Aunt Chen from the neighborhood committees often helps to resolve disputes among the dwellers.
sentences.chinese: 居委会的陈大妈经常为大家排忧解纷。

sentences.english: She helped to settle disputes and offered advice to the people who came to her.
sentences.chinese: 她协助到她那里去的人排难解纷，给予忠告。

definition: to remove perils and solve disputes (idiom); to reconcile differences
rule by virtue/rule by setting virtuous example (Confucian ideal)
to hear litigation (in a law court)/to hear a case
to advance or retreat, each has its rules (idiom from Zhuangzi); many translations are possible
